name: There's A Clown In My Closet
name_original: There's A Clown In My Closet
description:
This is a game made by Iain Harrison and Lena Van on the 1st of October 2020 for a self set game a day challenge similar to Inktober.

The game took around 1 hour to create.

All art was made by Lena Van.

The game was build in unity by Iain Harrison.
